=INTRO=

This page describes how to use the adb port forwarder

=USAGE+

1.  Download the adbportforward.jar from the Downloads section
2.  Start the port forwarder on the machine on which the device is connected with the command: 

java -jar adbportforward.jar server adblocation=[adb location]

3. Start the port forwader on the remote machine with the command:

java -jar adbportforward.jar client adblocation=[adb location] remotehost=[ip of machine to which android device is connected]

replace [adb location] with the location where the android sdk is located on your system.
